Description: On I-64 at mile marker 293.1 in the City of Chesapeake, near 464 Interchange, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The west right shoulder is closed.

Description: On I-81 at mile marker 114.5 in the County of Montgomery, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The north left shoulder and left lane are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 69.6 in the City of Richmond, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The north right shoulder is closed. The north exit ramp narrows.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle

Description: On US-501 in the County of Campbell, in the vicinity of Marshall Mill Rd; Rt. 654E/W (Campbell County), motorists can expect delays due to a multi-vehicle crash. All north lanes are closed. All south lanes are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Multi-Vehicle Crash

Description: On I-495 at mile marker 55 in the County of Fairfax, motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. The south center lane, right center lane, right outside lane, and right shoulder are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Tractor Trailer Crash
